prompt: Create a professional chat list page with a clean white background and a dark blue app bar with the title 'Messages' in bold white text, a search icon, and a new chat icon (pencil). Each chat item in the scrollable list should feature a 50px circular profile picture on the left with a gray background, contact name in bold black text, message preview in dark gray, and timestamp in small gray text on the right. Include a subtle divider line and 16px padding per item. Ensure a polished, business-like aesthetic with smooth scrolling and responsive design.
